explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions using machine learning to predict realized variance and build a volatility index.
explanations.supervised learning: The methods used (Ridge regression, Feedforward Neural Networks, Random Forest) are supervised learning techniques as they involve training on labeled data.
explanations.regression: Ridge regression is a regression technique mentioned in the paper for predicting variance.
explanations.neural network: Feedforward Neural Networks are mentioned as one of the algorithms tested.
explanations.deep learning: Feedforward Neural Networks can be considered a part of deep learning, especially if they have multiple hidden layers.
